
h1. SQL or XPath based search


* Select the location you want to search
* Switch to the *Search* tab
* Click on the

!icon.gif !

 icon(the

! SearchIcon.jpg!

 for DMS 2.5). The *Advanced Search* form will appear and select the *New Query* tab :


!form1!


There are two query types for you to choose: SQL and xPath. To create one, do as follows:

* Input the query name
* Select the query type
* Input the query statement.
* Click the *Search* button to review the search result and display a search result in the *Search Results* tab or *Save* to accept creating a new query.
* The new saved query will be displayed in the existing query list in the *Saved Query* tab
